page.title: 02Melanies Sunday activities.
page.content: On a{Sunday morning}my brother wakes me up at about{7.30 a.m to watch the {television.}After that we have our breakfast, which is cereals and toast. Then we get ready to go up to my Nanna's for our dinner. When we get there my Mum and I clean up. At about {12.30 p.m we have our dinner}then I wash all the pots. When we return home me and my brother play out on our bikes with our friends at{4.30 p.m}we go in to watch Supergran on the television, then we go back out to play. We come in at{7.00 p.m}to have our hair washed and get a bath. Then we watch the television until{10.00 p.m Then we go up to bed. We read for about 20 minutes before we have our lights turned off.
